verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
Who is like You
Took the sin of the world
on Your shoulders
You did it so willingly

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
1 Pre Chorus:
God the price You paid
will forever be enough
and the life You gave
Yeah, You gave it all for love

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Your name is glorious
we lift You up higher, higher
Come see what God has done
and lift Him up higher, higher

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
Who can fathom
the depths of the seas
and the universe
how far does it reach

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
2 Pre Chorus:
Still You spread Your arms
upon the Cross for us
And the life You gave
Yeah, You gave it all for love

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Bridge:
we will sing, will sing
we will sing over again
we will bring, the highest praise
to the King, sing it again
